question: An investment of Rs.400 crore is to be made in which Union state/UT, to make it a fisheries hub?
explanation:
The Union Minister for Fisheries Giriraj Singh has announced an investment of Rs.400 crore to the state of Goa. This investment is intended to make the coastal state a hub for fisheries in the country.
It has been stated that out of the said Rs.400 crore, an investment of Rs.41.47 crore has already been sanctioned to the state from the Central Government.
